tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Justin Bieber - As Long As You Love Me PARODY! Key of Awesome #62
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Justin Bieber is all grown up and ready to fight for love! Watch Behind the Scenes! youtu.be See the original- www.youtube.com Check out our second Channel! bit.ly Subscribe to Awesome! bit.ly Subscribe to BarelyPolitical! www.youtube.com The Key of Awesome Website! www.thekeyofawesome.com...

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Thumbs up for the dark﻿ side..
"You little bag of shit" ha﻿ ha great one :P
Well that escalated quickly﻿
hahahaha﻿
Funny ass shit!! "﻿ because I'm gonna kill you dumb shit"! Lol!!!??
This needs auto captioning subtitles... what would it come up with?﻿
Pleas , someon give me a link to the booty jam﻿ !!!
that dark haired girl﻿ looks like a super model from victoria secret, i'd lose my head for that lol
"COULD YOU PLEASE﻿ LE-E-E-E-E-E-TT GO OF MY NUTS"
When you guys were watching the actuall as long as you﻿ love me video did you saw anything else exept the end where he was killing him?
Until he got﻿ fucked up the guy playing Justin beiber was fucking hawt :)
Thumbs up for darth bieber 3:21﻿
that name no longer means anything to me it﻿ is dark bieber
That guy who was playing justin bieber is so freakin﻿ hot ;)
i want the booty jam﻿ on my ipod
Brilliant for every one who hates Justin but not so good for the lovers well done key of awesome are exactly﻿ as they say on the tin
do the gungnam style﻿ parody please!!!
Ban la nguoi﻿ Viet Nam dung ko?Comment hay qua!
No one can touch me im freaking bruce lee i punch a nazi right in the throat ur daddy is winnie his wienner﻿ is tiny is he right behind me that was just a jokr
Jan is soooo cute﻿ with that hair!
uhhh......what happened to﻿ his ten body guards when he was getting drilled by a scooter?
One﻿ of the best biographies on Justin Beiber
no justins﻿ on the dark side so i won't do it
thumbs up if this is ur favorite key of awesome vid﻿

Reviewer.Music: randomish songs with words that dont make sense
